document.full_text: big-spending boston brought their new-look team to the bronx for the first time to face arch-rivals new york on friday and emerged with a 5-4 win over the yankees after adrian gonzalez belted a home run and drove in two runs.
document.title: sweet-swinging gonzalez helps red sox beat yankees
lines_and_colors: big-spending boston brought their new-look team to the bronx for the first time to face arch-rivals new york on friday and emerged with a 5-4 win over the yankees after adrian gonzalez belted a home run and drove in two runs.
